mapper.sql: fid, fuid, ftradeid, fbuycoinid, fsellcoinid, fstatus, ftype, flast, fprize, fcount, famount, fsuccessamount, fleftcount, fleftfees, ffees, fmatchtype, fsource, fhuobientrustid, fhuobiaccountid, flastupdattime, fcreatetime, fislever
mapper.select: select sum(case when ftype = 0 then 1 else 0 end ) as buyCount , sum(case when ftype = 1 then 1 else 0 end ) as sellCount, sum(case when ftype = 0 then fcount - fleftcount else 0 end ) as sumBuy , sum(case when ftype = 1 then fcount - fleftcount else 0 end ) as sumSell, sum(case when ftype = 0 then ffees else 0 end ) as feesBuy , sum(case when ftype = 1 then ffees else 0 end ) as feesSell from f_entrust_history where ftradeId = #{ftradeId} and date_format(fcreatetime, "%Y-%m-%d") = #{fcreatetime} ;

select sum(case when ftype = 0 then 1 else 0 end ) as buyCount , sum(case when ftype = 1 then 1 else 0 end ) as sellCount from (select fuid, ftype from f_entrust_history where ftradeId = #{ftradeId} and date_format(fcreatetime, "%Y-%m-%d") = #{fcreatetime} group by fuid, ftype) as fen;

SELECT sum(trade_amount) AS trade_amount, sum(trade_count) AS trade_count, sum(trade_fee) AS trade_fee FROM (SELECT ifnull(sum(fsuccessamount),0) as trade_amount, ifnull(sum(fcount-fleftcount),0) as trade_count, ifnull(sum(ffees),0) as trade_fee FROM f_entrust_history WHERE ftradeid = #{tradeId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND (fstatus = 3 or (fstatus = 5 and famount > 0)) AND ftype = #{type, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND flastupdattime >= #{begin, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND flastupdattime < #{end, jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT ifnull(sum(fsuccessamount),0) as trade_amount, ifnull(sum(fcount-fleftcount),0) as trade_count, ifnull(sum(ffees),0) as trade_fee FROM f_entrust WHERE ftradeid = #{tradeId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND (fstatus = 3 or fstatus = 2) AND ftype = #{type, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND flastupdattime >= #{begin, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND flastupdattime < #{end, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) v_temp
